column2: In this supplement to the Monster Smoothie quests, you'll get access to the files used to make the videos you learned from.
Hi, {{user_name}}. Did you enjoy the Monster Smoothie activity? Even if you didn't get all the way though, I think you'll be interested in this.
All the files that were used to make the videos you learned from are now in your home directory - ~/BlenderSources/MonsterSmoothieFiles
I hope you'll find these useful - try and find any differences between how you did something, and how the originals did it. You might find some interesting tricks!
I hope you had lots of fun making your monster. See you again soon!
